Report.Description: Reporting showing software licenses which are under SW Maintenance and their expiration/renewal dates
Report.SearchSQL:
-- Avoid locking by allowing result to contain uncommitted rows SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
-- Set the language to us_english so the datetime is consistent SET LANGUAGE us_english
-- Split search words DECLARE @SearchWholeWord nvarchar(max) SET @SearchWholeWord = @SearchText DECLARE @SearchWords table(Word nvarchar(400) PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @SearchWordCount int IF (@SearchText IS NOT NULL AND @SearchText <> '') BEGIN INSERT @SearchWords SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TableSplitSearchWords(@SearchWholeWord) END SELECT @SearchWordCount = COUNT(DISTINCT Word) FROM @SearchWords
-- Pre-calculate licenses that user is allowed access CREATE TABLE #SoftwareLicenseAllowed (SoftwareLicenseID int PRIMARY KEY) INSERT #SoftwareLicenseAllowed SELECT SoftwareLicenseID FROM SoftwareLicenseCurrentUser
-- Pre-calculate contracts that user is allowed access CREATE TABLE #ContractAllowed (ContractID int PRIMARY KEY) INSERT #ContractAllowed SELECT * FROM TableContractCurrentUser(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)
-- Limit rows returned if setting is present or provided row limit parameter not null SET @RowLimit = dbo.MinRowLimit(@RowLimit, 'MaxCustomViewResultRows'); IF @RowLimit IS NULL OR @RowLimit = -1 BEGIN SET @RowLimit = 0x7FFFFFFF; END -- Custom view results query SELECT TOP(@RowLimit) results.* FROM ( -- Custom view query for licenses SELECT SoftwareLicense.SoftwareLicenseID AS [SoftwareLicenseID], SoftwareLicense.Name AS [Name], SoftwareLicense.Version AS [Version], SoftwareLicense.Edition AS [Edition], Publisher.VendorName AS [PublisherName], SoftwareLicenseTypeI18N.TypeDefaultValue AS [LicenseType], LicenseStatusI18N.DefaultValue AS [LicenseStatus], CAST(CASE WHEN (ISNULL(smt.NumberMaintained,0) > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) AS [HasActiveMaintenance], SoftwareLicense.TrueUp AS [LicenseSubjectToTrueUp], SoftwareLicenseDurationI18N.DurationDefaultValue AS [Duration], SoftwareLicense.ExpiryDate AS [ExpiryDate], AssetWarrantyTypeI18N.WarrantyTypeDefaultValue AS [LicenseWarrantyType], SoftwareLicense.WarrantyExpiryDate AS [WarrantyExpiryDate], ProductPrimary.ProductName AS [ProductName], SoftwareLicense.ParentLicenseID AS [ParentLicenseID], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractID], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractNumber], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractName], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractType], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_EndDate], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_Last renewed date], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_MasterContractNumber], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_MasterContractType], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_NeverExpires], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_RenewalDate], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_PreExpiryDate], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_StartDate], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractStatus], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_TotalValue], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_Vendor], [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_MasterContractID] FROM SoftwareLicenseCurrentUserScoped AS SoftwareLicense -- Filter INNER JOIN #SoftwareLicenseAllowed AS filter ON filter.SoftwareLicenseID = SoftwareLicense.SoftwareLicenseID -- Additional joins LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS Publisher ON Publisher.VendorID = SoftwareLicense.PublisherID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareLicenseTypeI18N ON SoftwareLicenseTypeI18N.SoftwareLicenseTypeID = SoftwareLicense.LicenseTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN LicenseStatusI18N ON LicenseStatusI18N.LicenseStatusID = SoftwareLicense.LicenseStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareLicensePODetailMaintenanceTotalsCurrentUser AS smt ON smt.SoftwareLicenseID = SoftwareLicense.SoftwareLicenseID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareLicenseDurationI18N ON SoftwareLicenseDurationI18N.SoftwareLicenseDurationID = SoftwareLicense.DurationID LEFT OUTER JOIN AssetWarrantyTypeI18N ON AssetWarrantyTypeI18N.AssetWarrantyTypeID = SoftwareLicense.WarrantyTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT slp_maxed.SoftwareLicenseID, CASE WHEN slp_maxed.ProductCount = 1 THEN stp.ProductName ELSE (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('SoftwareLicenseProduct.Multiple')) END AS ProductName FROM (SELECT slp_inner.SoftwareLicenseID, MIN(slp_inner.SoftwareTitleProductID) AS SoftwareTitleProductID, COUNT(slp_inner.SoftwaretitleProductID) AS ProductCount FROM dbo.SoftwareLicenseProduct AS slp_inner WHERE slp_inner.Supplementary = 0 GROUP BY slp_inner.SoftwareLicenseID) AS slp_maxed INNER JOIN dbo.SoftwareTitleProduct AS stp ON stp.SoftwareTitleProductID = slp_maxed.SoftwareTitleProductID) ProductPrimary ON ProductPrimary.SoftwareLicenseID = SoftwareLicense.SoftwareLicenseID -- Link from License to Contracts via SoftwareLicenseContract table LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SoftwareLicenseContract.SoftwareLicenseID, Contract.* FROM SoftwareLicenseContract INNER JOIN ( -- Custom view query for contracts SELECT Contract.ContractID AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractID], Contract.ContractNo AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractNumber], Contract.ContractName AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractName], ContractTypeI18N.ContractTypeDefaultValue AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractType], Contract.EndDate AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_EndDate], Contract.LastRenewedDate AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_Last renewed date], MasterContract.ContractNo AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_MasterContractNumber], MasterContractType.ContractTypeDefaultValue AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_MasterContractType], Contract.NeverExpires AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_NeverExpires], Contract.RenewalDate AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_RenewalDate], Contract.PreExpiryDate AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_PreExpiryDate], Contract.StartDate AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_StartDate], ContractStatusI18N.DefaultValue AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractStatus], CAST(Contract.TotalValue * TotalValueRate.Rate AS money) AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_TotalValue], v.VendorName AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_Vendor], Contract.MasterContractID AS [R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_MasterContractID] FROM Contract -- Filter INNER JOIN #ContractAllowed AS filter ON filter.ContractID = Contract.ContractID -- Additional joins LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ContractTypeI18N ON ContractTypeI18N.ContractTypeID = Contract.ContractTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS MasterContract ON MasterContract.ContractID = [Contract].MasterContractID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Contract AS MasterContract2 ON [Contract].MasterContractID = MasterContract2.ContractID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ContractTypeI18N AS MasterContractType ON MasterContractType.ContractTypeID = MasterContract2.ContractTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ContractStatusI18N ON ContractStatusI18N.ContractStatusID = Contract.ContractStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN GetCurrencyExchangeRates(@CurrencyID) AS TotalValueRate ON TotalValueRate.CurrencyRateID = Contract.TotalValueRateID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Vendor AS v ON v.VendorID = Contract.VendorID ) AS Contract ON Contract.R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractID = SoftwareLicenseContract.ContractID ) AS LicenseToContract ON LicenseToContract.SoftwareLicenseID = SoftwareLicense.SoftwareLicenseID ) AS results WHERE (@SearchWordCount = 0) OR (@SearchWordCount = ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT words.Word) FROM @SearchWords AS words WHERE ([Name] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') OR ([Version] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') OR ([Edition] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') OR ([R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractNumber] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') OR ([R2_5e423854fc2efabec1c45cc2c1f874e0_LicenseToContract_ContractName] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') )) OPTION (RECOMPILE)

THEN stp.ProductName ELSE (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('SoftwareLicenseProduct.Multiple')) END AS ProductName FROM (SELECT slp_inner.SoftwareLicenseID, MIN(slp_inner.SoftwareTitleProductID) AS SoftwareTitleProductID, COUNT(slp_inner.SoftwaretitleProductID) AS ProductCount FROM dbo.SoftwareLicenseProduct AS slp_inner WHERE slp_inner.Supplementary = 0 Report.SearchXML: <customview> <!--Custom view properties--> <name>090.01.07 Software License Maintenance</name> <description>Reporting showing software licenses which are under SW Maintenance and their expiration/renewal dates</description> <schemaVersion>2.0</schemaVersion> <productVersion>13.1.1</productVersion> <!--Master custom view object--> <object name="License" major="true"> <column index="0" name="License.Name" show="true" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="1" name="License.Version" show="true" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="2" name="License.Edition" show="true" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="3" name="License.PublisherName" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="4" name="License.LicenseType" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="5" name="License.LicenseStatus" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="6" name="License.HasActiveMaintenance" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="7" name="License.LicenseSubjectToTrueUp" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="8" name="License.Duration" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="9" name="License.ExpiryDate" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="10" name="License.LicenseWarrantyType" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="11" name="License.WarrantyExpiryDate" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="21" name="License.ProductName" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <!--Linked LicenseToContract--> <relation name="LicenseToContract"> <object name="Contract" major="true"> <column index="12" name="Contract.ContractNumber" show="false" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="13" name="Contract.ContractType" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="14" name="Contract.EndDate" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="15" name="Last renewed date" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="16" name="Contract.MasterContractNumber" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="17" name="Contract.MasterContractType" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="18" name="Contract.ContractName" show="false" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="19" name="Contract.NeverExpires" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="20" name="Contract.RenewalDate" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="22" name="Contract.PreExpiryDate" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="23" name="Contract.StartDate" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="24" name="Contract.ContractStatus" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="25" name="Contract.TotalValue" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="26" name="Contract.Vendor" show="false" match="Excluded" /> </object> </relation> </object> </customview>
